author: Noah Scarbrough

changelog.release_notes: - Added icon for onboard watchface picker

Biggest update yet!

- Info Bar is now open source! :D Source code can be obtained by copy/paste out of the main description
- Big improvements to conserve battery life and processor memory.
- Weekday slot is slightly larger so it is even easier to read
- Numerous behind the scenes changes for better performance and cleaner code

Thank you so much for all the hearts and installs! I never thought it would go this far.

- Information bar redesign, now showing day of the week!
- Made tweaks to the interface, especially on round displays for a more balanced experience
- Cleaned up some code

Thank you for your support!

description:
Info Bar is a basic digital watchface, but with a unique twist. A unified bar of important information spans across the middle of the watch. This is a useful design for looking at more than just the time without clutter getting in the way.
 
Shows:
 - Time
 - Seconds
 - Day of the week
 - Date
 - Battery percentage
 
...all in an easy to read arrangement. Enjoy this and please leave a heart for a 16 year old amateur coder! Be sure to check out my new Android M watchface as well.
 
Supports all watches! Only in English at this time.
